name: Lorem Ipsum by Webline
author: weblineindia

sections.description:
Lorem Ipsum by Webline is an easy to use plugin with Lorem Ipsum Shortcode Generator to generate dummy text using dynamic shortcode that you can use in any posts and pages.

This plugin uses Lorem Ipsum API (http://loripsum.net/api) to fetch lorem ipsum text which is free.

No need of authentication such as password and API keys Generation for Lorem Ipsum API.

We are not making any call backs to our server and not storing any data of user.

Key Features

  • Control for specify number of paragraphs with paragraph length.

  • You can also specify below extra parameters to get different output.

    • Decorate – Add bold, italic and marked text.
    • Link – Add links.
    • UL – Add unordered lists.
    • OL – Add numbered lists.
    • DL – Add description lists.
    • BQ – Add blockquotes.
    • CODE – Add code samples.
    • Headers – Add headers.
    • All Caps – Use ALL CAPS.
    • Prude – Prude version.
    • Plaintext – Return plain text, no HTML.

  • Preview Text is also available to see your output.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip ‘lorem-ipsum-by-webline.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory or add it by ‘Add new’ in the Plugins menu.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu.
  3. Go to Lorem Ipsum in the admin menu.

1.0.9

Release Date: August 13, 2024
* Fix: Checked compatibility with WordPress version 6.6.1

* Fix: Minor bug fixes

Release Date: March 22, 2024
* Enhancement: Minor UI optimization for Information Banner.

1.0.5

Release Date: January 31, 2024
* Fix: Checked compatibility with WordPress version 6.4.3
* Enhancement: Moved plugin settings as submenu under WordPress Settings

1.0.4

Release Date: February 02, 2023
* Fix: Minor bug fixes.
* Fix: Checked compatibility with WordPress version 6.1

1.0.3

Release Date: January 01, 2020
* Fix: Resolved conflict issue.

1.0.2

Release Date: April 25, 2016
* Small bug fixes.
* Added feature of save settings.

1.0.1

Release Date: April 06, 2016
* Small bug fixes.

1.0.0

Release Date: November 30, 2015
* Initial release
